hero.title: Discover the Healing Power of Sound
hero.subtitle: Transform your well-being with therapeutic sound healing designed for deep relaxation, stress relief, and mental clarity.

sleep.title: Sleep Disorders
sleep.description: Insomnia, restless sleep, or trouble falling asleep

stress.title: Stress & Anxiety
stress.description: Daily stress, work pressure, or anxiety management

meditation.title: Meditation Practice
meditation.description: Enhance your meditation with guided soundscapes

workplace.title: Workplace Wellness
workplace.description: Improve focus and reduce workplace stress

recovery.title: Recovery Support
recovery.description: Support healing and recovery processes naturally

scientifically.title: Scientifically Backed
scientifically.description: Our therapeutic sounds are based on proven research in sound healing and neuroscience.

personalized.title: Personalized Experience
personalized.description: Tailored sound therapy sessions that adapt to your unique wellness needs and preferences.

professional.title: Professional Quality
professional.description: High-fidelity audio designed by sound therapy experts for maximum therapeutic benefit.

accessible.title: Always Accessible
accessible.description: Access your healing sounds anytime, anywhere, from any device.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Well-being?
cta.authenticatedDescription: Continue your wellness journey with our therapeutic sound healing platform.
cta.guestDescription: Join thousands of users who have discovered the life-changing power of therapeutic sound healing. Choose your subscription tier and experience the difference that professional audio therapy can make.

science.title: The Science Behind Sound Therapy
science.intro: Sound therapy is backed by extensive scientific research.
science.description: Studies have shown that specific audio frequencies can influence brainwave patterns, reduce cortisol levels, and trigger the body's natural relaxation response. Our therapeutic sounds utilize principles from neuroscience, psychology, and traditional healing practices to provide measurable wellness benefits.
